metadata.title: CVE-2023-4147 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - high
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s Netfilterfunctionality when adding a rule with NFTA_RULE_CHAIN_ID. This flaw allowsa local user to crash or escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-5.5').
linux-aws package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1005.5').

linux-gke package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
